data.content:
Động từ
dành riêng (cho một mục đích)
I earmark a sum of money for research
tôi dành riêng một số tiền cho công việc nghiên cứu

noun
plural -marks
[count] :a mark or quality that shows what something is or what it could be
The business plan had (all) the earmarks of success. [=it seemed likely to succeed] - compare hallmark
verb
-marks; -marked; -marking
[+ obj] to say that something will be used or treated in a specified way - often used as (be) earmarked
The old building has been earmarked for demolition.
to put (money) aside for a special purpose
The project uses funds that had been earmarked for education.
